thread.title: Stock Review for Independent Oil Gas Investors -- Apache, Baytex Energy, Cabot Oil & Gas, and California Resources

author: cnbc.com
title: Stock Review for Independent Oil Gas Investors -- Apache, Baytex Energy, Cabot Oil & Gas, and California Resources

organizations.name: stock review for independent oil gas investors

text:
NEW YORK, March 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on APA, BTE, COG, and CRC which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . WalltEquities.com reexplores the Independent Oil and Gas space, which is exclusively engaged in the exploration and production segment of the industry, with no downstream marketing or refining within their operations. Stocks under assessment this morning are: Apache Corp. (NYSE: APA), Baytex Energy Corp. (NYSE: BTE), Cabot Oil & Gas Corp. (NYSE: COG), and California Resources Corp. (NYSE: CRC). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Apache
On Monday, shares in Houston, Texas-based Apache Corp. recorded a trading volume of 3.04 million shares. The stock ended the day at $35.41, rising slightly by 0.25% from the last trading session. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 14.45%. Furthermore, shares of Apache, which explores for, develops, and produces natural gas, crude oil, and natural gas liquids (NGLs), have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 39.01.
On March 05 th , 2018, Apache announced that David Pursell has been named senior vice president, Planning and Energy Fundamentals, effective March 12 th , 2018. He will oversee corporate planning as well as energy fundamentals systems, processes, and analysis. Get the full research report on APA for free by clicking below at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=APA
Baytex Energy
Calgary, Canada headquartered Baytex Energy Corp.'s stock saw a slight decline of 0.34%, finishing yesterday's session at $2.90 with a total trading volume of 1.86 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 15.08% in the last month. The stock is trading above its 200-day moving average by 3.55%. Additionally, shares of Baytex Energy, which engages in the acquisition, development, and production of crude oil and natural gas in the Western Canadian Sedimentary Basin and Eagle Ford in the US, have an RSI of 55.89.
On March 06 th , 2018, Baytex Energy reported its results for the three months and year ended December 31 st , 2017. For Q4 2017, production averaged 69,556 boe/d (81% oil and NGL), capital expenditures for exploration and development activities totaled C$90 million, and adjusted funds flow were C$106 million. For the full year 2017, production averaged 70,242 boe/d (80% oil and NGL), capital expenditures for exploration and development activities totaled C$326 million, and adjusted funds flow were C$348 million. Get access to our top-rated research, including the free report on BTE at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BTE
Cabot Oil & Gas
Shares in Houston, Texas headquartered Cabot Oil & Gas Corp. ended the session flat at $25.52. The stock recorded a trading volume of 3.97 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 10.91% in the last month and 12.37% over the past year. The stock is trading 1.38% below its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of the Company, which develops, exploits, explores for, produces, and markets natural gas, oil, and NGLs in the US, have an RSI of 53.98.
On February 23 rd , 2018, Cabot Oil & Gas reported its results for the quarter and year ended December 31 st , 2017. For Q4 2017, equivalent production was 172.6 billion cubic feet equivalent (Bcfe), net loss was $(44.4) million, and net cash provided by operating activities was $179.1 million. For the full year, equivalent production was 685.3 Bcfe, net income was $100.4 million, and net cash provided by operating activities was $898.2 million. Click here to subscribe for a free membership which welcomes you with our report on COG at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=COG
California Resources
At the closing bell on Monday, Los Angeles, California headquartered California Resources Corp.'s stock declined slightly by 0.21%, finishing at $14.44. A total volume of 1.21 million shares was traded. The Company's shares are trading 11.49% above their 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of California Resources, which operates as an oil and natural gas exploration and production company in the State of California, have an RSI of 35.86.
On March 01 st , 2018, California Resources announced that Todd Stevens, President and CEO, will be presenting at the Scotia Howard Weil 46 th Annual Energy Conference on March 28 th , 2018 in New Orleans, Louisiana. The accompanying slides as well as the webcast link for this presentation will be available under the Investor Relations section of the Company's website on the day of the event. To get free access to your research report on CRC, sign up at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CRC
--
